Articles.Content: I am a relatively new player to the game. (X oxone)However whenever I try to use manuver nodes to match the inclination of other objects all I can do is adjust the ecliptic I am currently in. In essence I can not cant my orbit on the Y axis. Any help would be appreciated.

Are you saying you are unable to cycle through the directions of the maneuver node with LB? (assuming same controls as PS4)

The direction defaults to prograde and retrograde (yellow) but you should be able to cycle through the directions with LB and you want to use normal and antinormal (purple) to change your inclination.

Edit :- I think it might be RB, not LB. I think LB switches the function of the node (move along orbit, directions of maneuver, delete node) and RB cycles through directions when on that function. I get them mixed up while playing so it's no surprise I can't remember which is which 5 minutes after playing.

Edited September 27, 2019 by drpunk
@Kickasserson, there is a tutorial mission that helps you learn the Manouver Node and get used to it. In short, play the tutorials.
